summary: a Brand new follower caled Sorrdor the Tongue- A re-upload of my old one
descriptionHtml:
Sorrdor is a a 2handed melee bruiser he is capable of taking lots of hits while dishing out decent damage with his own unique war hammer
He is essential so he cant die and will be willing to commit any crime
He is marriageable
You can find him in the Four Shields Tavern in Dragon bridge
He also has a journal in his inventory which explains about his past and what his goal is for the future.
I APOLOGIZE TO ALL THE PEOPLE WHO DOWNLOADED IT BEFORE BUT THIS IS AN IMPROVED VERSION SINCE THE OLD ONE HAD A FEW BUGS.

Any more bugs let me know

i also plan to make a mini quest behind him (related to his past, read it and find out :P) and unique dialogue
author: Roxas559
